title: Untitled-the world wide public records and/or media records disseminated by the securitized (us law enforcement and military) branches of the united states as the world wide worst notorious sex offender/pedophile

communications.communication:

-foia exemption 7(E). Would disclose techniques and procedures for law enforcement investigations or prosecutions, or would disclose guidelines for law enforcement investigations or prosecutions if such disclosure could reasonably be expected to risk circumvention of the law, among other exemptions Congress established nine exemptions from disclosure for certain categories of information to protect against certain harms, such as an invasion of personal privacy, or harm to law enforcement investigations. The FOIA authorizes agencies to withhold information when they reasonably foresee that disclosure would harm an interest protected by one of these nine exemptions.
-6) the extrajudicial application the united states department of material support statute cancelling all humanitarian aid to convicted terrorists and terrorist suspects within and without the united states.

-the world wide public records and/or media records disseminated by the securitized (us law enforcement and military) branches of the united states as the world wide worst notorious sex offender/pedophile, while held in enforced/involuntary disappearance and/or related prolonged isolation in homeland fema security grants beneficiaries for non for profit shelters and related health and human services in the united states 

lydia warr
05/20/2023- present-boston public health commission-woods mullen women shelter, 794 Massachusetts Ave, Boston, MA 02118,modifed as a black site

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Lydia Warr

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Run Logs, Mileage Records, and Trip Summaries for the Mercedes Sprinter Van the City purchased in 2020 using federal COVID-19 community support funds.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free
